title: [The siege of Rhodes]
author: Caoursin, Guillaume, d. 1501.
publisher: J. Lettou? and W. de Machlinia?,
notes: Title from and imprint suggested by STC.
Heading, folio 1r: [T]o the moste excellente, moste redoubted, and most crysten kyng: Kynge Edwarde the fourth Johan kay hys humble poete lawreate, and most lowly seruant ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
